title: Access
body:
Access¶

Access displays program members or groups (eg. Everyone) and their access privileges (view, edit, or manage).

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click CRM

  3. Click Programs

  4. Click a program

  5. Click Access

  6. Click Manage Access

    • Select a group or individual contact to add to the program (by default, their access privilege will be limited to view)

    • Click to delete a contact or group from the program

    • Click on the current access privilege until satisfied with the access privilege

  7. Click Save
